rationale: The segment does not contain an intensifier or comparative adjective directly modifying a risk-adjective.
The segment states outbreak came despite ordering birds indoors using neutral language. 'highly pathogenic' is technical.
No loaded rhetorical question is present in the text.
The segment reports an outbreak despite ordering birds indoors but contains no explicit calming language.
The segment does not contain a bare negation.
Describes a measure taken ('government last week ordering all birds... to be kept indoors') without active reassurance.
